amendment.description: Amendment establishes a procedure for the payment of existing debt owed by the government of American Samoa.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to specify conditions for a loan to be granted to the government of American Samoa with the repayment accomplished from the Tobacco Master Settlement Agreement and establishes a fiscal and managerial reform program for American Samoa.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Faleomavaega amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
